statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT student_name, performance_metrics -> 'attendance' AS attendance_metrics FROM student_grades
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade, performance_metrics->>'attendance' AS attendance FROM student_grades WHERE performance_metrics->>'attendance' = 'present' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_name HAVING AVG(grade) > 75 ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, performance_metrics->>'assignments' AS assignments FROM student_grades WHERE performance_metrics @> '{"tests": ["A+", "A"]}' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, MAX(grade) AS max_grade, MIN(grade) AS min_grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10
SELECT student_name, subject, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name
SELECT s.student_name, g.subject, g.grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id WHERE s.grade_level = 10 ORDER BY s.student_name ASC, g.grade DESC;

SELECT s.student_name, s.grade_level, AVG(g.grade) AS average_grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name, s.grade_level HAVING COUNT(g.grade) >= 2 ORDER BY average_grade DESC;

SELECT s.student_name, COUNT(g.subject) AS subject_count FROM students s LEFT JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name HAVING subject_count > 1 ORDER BY s.student_name ASC;
SELECT s.student_name, MAX(g.grade) AS highest_grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name ORDER BY highest_grade DESC, s.student_name ASC;

SELECT s.student_name, SUM(g.grade) AS total_grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id WHERE s.grade_level > 10 GROUP BY s.student_name HAVING total_grade > 300 ORDER BY total_grade DESC, s.student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Courses.course_name, Grades.grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.age < 25 AND Courses.credits > 2

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, AVG(Grades.grade) AS avg_grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING count(Grades.grade) > 1
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT exam_name, exam_date FROM exam ORDER BY exam_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, score FROM student JOIN grade ON student.student_id = grade.student_id WHERE score < 70;
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student WHERE grade >= 80;

SELECT student_name, course_name, exam_name, score FROM student JOIN grade ON student.student_id = grade.student_id JOIN exam ON grade.exam_id = exam.exam_id JOIN course ON exam.course_id = course.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, exam_date FROM student, exam, course WHERE student.student_id = grade.student_id AND exam.course_id = course.course_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM student JOIN grade ON student.student_id = grade.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments;
SELECT student_id, average_grade, attendance_percent FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT student_id, average_grade, attendance_percent FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY average_grade DESC
